resources.string: Welcome to my first app ever! Below is info about me

I have two dogs, a boston terrier and a yorkie terrier mix named Oreo and Rocky 
 
I have a lovely wife named Boyu 
 
I work for Zeek's Pizza as a delivery driver and love getting free pizza! 
 
I hope to one day become a developer, I am currently leaning towards web but if mobile is fun I may just do that! 
 
I love video games and am currently playing Farcry 5
